org.grouplens.lenskit.util

Interface ScoredItemAccumulator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopNScoredItemAccumulator, UnlimitedScoredItemAccumulator

    public interface ScoredItemAccumulator
    Accumulate a sorted list of scored items.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ScoredId> finish()
      Accumulate the scores into a sorted scored list and reset the accumulator.
      LongSet finishSet()
      Accumulate the scored items into a set.
      MutableSparseVector finishVector()
      Accumulate the scores into a mutable sparse vector and reset the accumulator.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Query whether the accumulator is empty.
      void put(long item, double score)
      Put a new item in the accumulator.
      int size()
      Get the number of items in the accumulator.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Query whether the accumulator is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the accumulator has no items.

      • size

        int size()
        Get the number of items in the accumulator.
        Returns:
        The number of items accumulated so far, up to the maximum items desired from the accumulator.

      • put

        void put(long item,
       double score)
        Put a new item in the accumulator. Putting the same item twice does not replace the previous entry - it adds a new entry with the same ID.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to add to the accumulator.
        score - The item's score.

      • finish

        java.util.List<ScoredId> finish()
        Accumulate the scores into a sorted scored list and reset the accumulator. Items are sorted in decreasing order of score.

        After this method is called, the accumulator is ready for another accumulation.

        Returns:
        The sorted, scored list of items.

      • finishVector

        MutableSparseVector finishVector()
        Accumulate the scores into a mutable sparse vector and reset the accumulator.

        After this method is called, the accumulator is ready for another accumulation.

        Returns:
        A MutableSparseVector of items.

      • finishSet

        LongSet finishSet()
        Accumulate the scored items into a set.
        Returns:
        The set of items accumulated.
